020    package com.craftfire.commons.cache;
021    
022    import java.util.HashMap;
023    import java.util.Map;
024    
025    import com.craftfire.commons.util.Util;
026    
027    public class CacheManager {
028        protected static final String defaultGroup = "default";
029        private Map<String, Map<Object, CacheItem>> items = new HashMap<String, Map<Object, CacheItem>>();
030        private Map<Object, Integer> lastID = new HashMap<Object, Integer>();
031        private int seconds = 300;
032        private boolean enabled = true;
033    
034        public void setCacheTime(int seconds) {
035            this.seconds = seconds;
036        }
037    
038        public int getCacheTime() {
039            return this.seconds;
040        }
041    
042        public void setEnabled(boolean enabled) {
043            this.enabled = enabled;
044        }
045    
046        public boolean isEnabled() {
047            return this.enabled;
048        }
049    
050        public Map<String, Map<Object, CacheItem>> getCache() {
051            return this.items;
052        }
053    
054        public Map<Object, CacheItem> getCache(String group) {
055            if (this.containsGroup(group)) {
056                return this.items.get(group);
057            }
058            return null;
059        }
060    
061        public int getLastID() {
062            return getLastID(this.defaultGroup);
063        }
064    
065        public int getLastID(String group) {
066            String newGroup = group.toLowerCase();
067            if (this.lastID.containsKey(newGroup)) {
068                return this.lastID.get(newGroup);
069            }
070            this.lastID.put(newGroup, 0);
071            return 0;
072        }
073    
074        public boolean contains(Object id) {
075            return contains(this.defaultGroup, id);
076        }
077    
078        public boolean containsGroup(String group) {
079            return this.enabled && this.items.containsKey(group);
080        }
081    
082        public boolean contains(String group, Object id) {
083            String newGroup = group.toLowerCase();
084            if (this.enabled && containsGroup(newGroup) && this.items.get(newGroup).containsKey(id)) {
085                if (this.items.get(newGroup).get(id).getSecondsLeft() >= 1) {
086                    return true;
087                } else {
088                    this.items.get(newGroup).remove(id);
089                }
090            }
091            return false;
092        }
093    
094        public void put(Object id, Object object) {
095            put(this.defaultGroup, id, object);
096        }
097    
098        public int put(Object object) {
099            return put(this.defaultGroup, object);
100        }
101    
102        public int put(String group, Object object) {
103            int id = getLastID(group) + 1;
104            put(group, id, object);
105            return id;
106        }
107    
108        public void put(String group, Object id, Object object) {
109            if (this.enabled) {
110                String newGroup = group.toLowerCase();
111                if (!containsGroup(newGroup)) {
112                    this.items.put(newGroup, new HashMap<Object, CacheItem>());
113                }
114                Map<Object, CacheItem> temp = this.items.get(newGroup);
115                temp.put(id, new CacheItem(id, this.seconds, object));
116                this.items.put(newGroup, temp);
117                if (id instanceof String && Util.isInteger((String) id)) {
118                    this.lastID.put(newGroup, Integer.parseInt((String) id));
119                }
120            }
121        }
122    
123        public void putMetadatable(Object id, Object object) {
124            putMetadatable(this.defaultGroup, id, object);
125        }
126    
127        public int putMetadatable(Object object) {
128            return putMetadatable(this.defaultGroup, object);
129        }
130    
131        public int putMetadatable(String group, Object object) {
132            int id = getLastID(group) + 1;
133            putMetadatable(group, id, object);
134            return id;
135        }
136    
137        public void putMetadatable(String group, Object id, Object object) {
138            if (this.enabled) {
139                String newGroup = group.toLowerCase();
140                if (!containsGroup(newGroup)) {
141                    this.items.put(newGroup, new HashMap<Object, CacheItem>());
142                }
143                Map<Object, CacheItem> temp = this.items.get(newGroup);
144                temp.put(id, new MetadatableCacheItem(id, this.seconds, object));
145                this.items.put(newGroup, temp);
146                if (id instanceof String && Util.isInteger((String) id)) {
147                    this.lastID.put(newGroup, Integer.parseInt((String) id));
148                }
149            }
150    
151        }
152    
153        public CacheItem getItem(Object id) {
154            return getItem(this.defaultGroup, id);
155        }
156    
157        public CacheItem getItem(String group, Object id) {
158            String newGroup = group.toLowerCase();
159            if (contains(newGroup, id)) {
160                return this.items.get(newGroup).get(id);
161            }
162            return null;
163        }
164    
165        public MetadatableCacheItem getMetadatableItem(Object id) {
166            return getMetadatableItem(this.defaultGroup, id);
167        }
168    
169        public MetadatableCacheItem getMetadatableItem(String group, Object id) {
170            String newGroup = group.toLowerCase();
171            if (contains(newGroup, id)) {
172                CacheItem item = this.items.get(newGroup).get(id);
173                if (item instanceof MetadatableCacheItem) {
174                    return (MetadatableCacheItem) item;
175                }
176            }
177            return null;
178        }
179    
180        public CacheItem getLastItem() {
181            return getLastItem(this.defaultGroup);
182        }
183    
184        public CacheItem getLastItem(String group) {
185            return getItem(group, getLastID(group));
186        }
187    
188        public Object get(Object id) {
189            return get(this.defaultGroup, id);
190        }
191    
192        public Object get(String group, Object id) {
193            String newGroup = group.toLowerCase();
194            if (contains(newGroup, id)) {
195                return this.items.get(newGroup).get(id).getObject();
196            }
197            return null;
198        }
199    
200        public Object getLast() {
201            return getLast(this.defaultGroup);
202        }
203    
204        public Object getLast(String group) {
205            return get(group, getLastID());
206        }
207    
208        public void remove(Object id) {
209            remove(this.defaultGroup, id);
210        }
211    
212        public void remove(String group, Object id) {
213            if (contains(group, id)) {
214                this.items.get(group.toLowerCase()).remove(id);
215            }
216        }
217    
218        public void clear(String group) {
219            String newGroup = group.toLowerCase();
220            if (containsGroup(newGroup)) {
221                this.items.get(newGroup).clear();
222            }
223            if (this.lastID.containsKey(newGroup)) {
224                this.items.remove(newGroup);
225            }
226        }
227    
228        public void clear() {
229            this.items.clear();
230            this.lastID.clear();
231        }
232    }
